title: Celebrity Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for June 3, 2025
description: The answers to Celebrity Wheel of Fortune on June 3. The post Celebrity Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for June 3, 2025 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here are the Celebrity Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers on June 3 with celebrities Cameron Brink, Rachael Harris, and Justin Long.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Here you’ll find the Celebrity Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer today for Tuesday, June 3, 2025. In what is the penultimate episode of Season 5, this is one of the last times that Pat Sajak will be the main host for any Wheel of Fortune game show. We’ve got all of the solutions for the bonus round, regular puzzles, and toss-ups for the episodes — that’s for two games, since the Celebrity version of the show is twice as long. For recaps of the regular show with Ryan Seacrest, you can check the answers for June 2025 here. Tonight’s game will feature Justin Long (Galaxy Quest), Cameron Brink (WNBA athlete), and Rachael Harris (Suits). All three celebrities will have multiple chances to win money for their chosen charities, though even if they don’t get a single dollar, they’ll still be able to give a $30,000. There’s only one more episode in the season, but you can find the full schedule for this season’s show is available here. The solutions to today’s Celebrity Wheel of Fortune puzzles for June 3 can be found below. What are the Celebrity Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Celebrity Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Game 1 on June 3, along with the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown. Bonus Round Puzzle – BODY LANGUAGE [Thing] Tossup #1 – THIS IS HOW WE DO IT [Song Lyrics] Tossup #2 – A NERVOUS WRECK [Person] Regular Puzzle #1 – MINDLESSLY SCROLLING TIKTOK [Fun & Games] Regular Puzzle #2 – ADAM SANDLER CHELSEA HANDLER [Rhyme Time] Tossup #3 – SIGNING UP FOR ACTING CLASS [Show Biz] Tossup #4 – SIGNING AUTOGRAPHS [Show Biz] Tossup #5 – SINGING MY HEART OUT [Show Biz] Regular Puzzle #3 – WHAT WE DO IN THE SHADOWS [TV Title] And here are the Celebrity Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Game 2 on June 3: Bonus Round Puzzle – LAUGH TRACK [Show Biz] Tossup #1 – WELCOME TO THE CLUB! [Phrase] Tossup #2 – PEEKABOO I SEE YOU [Rhyme Time] Regular Puzzle #1 – ESPRESSO BY SABRINA CARPENTER [Song/Artist] Regular Puzzle #2 – KEITH URBAN LEGEND [Before & After] Tossup #3 – CHAMPIONSHIP TROPHY [Thing] Tossup #4 – GOLD MEDAL [Thing] Tossup #5 – PARTICIPATION AWARD [Thing] Regular Puzzle #3 – WHERE’S THE WRAP PARTY? [Show Biz]
html:
Here you’ll find the Celebrity Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer today for Tuesday, June 3, 2025. In what is the penultimate episode of Season 5, this is one of the last times that Pat Sajak will be the main host for any Wheel of Fortune game show. We’ve got all of the solutions for the bonus round, regular puzzles, and toss-ups for the episodes — that’s for two games, since the Celebrity version of the show is twice as long. For recaps of the regular show with Ryan Seacrest, you can check the answers for June 2025 here.

Tonight’s game will feature Justin Long (Galaxy Quest), Cameron Brink (WNBA athlete), and Rachael Harris (Suits). All three celebrities will have multiple chances to win money for their chosen charities, though even if they don’t get a single dollar, they’ll still be able to give a $30,000. There’s only one more episode in the season, but you can find the full schedule for this season’s show is available here. The solutions to today’s Celebrity Wheel of Fortune puzzles for June 3 can be found below.

What are the Celebrity Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Celebrity Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Game 1 on June 3, along with the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown.

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – BODY LANGUAGE [Thing]
  • Tossup #1 – THIS IS HOW WE DO IT [Song Lyrics]
  • Tossup #2 – A NERVOUS WRECK [Person]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – MINDLESSLY SCROLLING TIKTOK [Fun & Games]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – ADAM SANDLER CHELSEA HANDLER [Rhyme Time]
  • Tossup #3 – SIGNING UP FOR ACTING CLASS [Show Biz]
  • Tossup #4 – SIGNING AUTOGRAPHS [Show Biz]
  • Tossup #5 – SINGING MY HEART OUT [Show Biz]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – WHAT WE DO IN THE SHADOWS [TV Title]

And here are the Celebrity Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Game 2 on June 3:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – LAUGH TRACK [Show Biz]
  • Tossup #1 – WELCOME TO THE CLUB! [Phrase]
  • Tossup #2 – PEEKABOO I SEE YOU [Rhyme Time]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – ESPRESSO BY SABRINA CARPENTER [Song/Artist]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – KEITH URBAN LEGEND [Before & After]
  • Tossup #3 – CHAMPIONSHIP TROPHY [Thing]
  • Tossup #4 – GOLD MEDAL [Thing]
  • Tossup #5 – PARTICIPATION AWARD [Thing]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – WHERE’S THE WRAP PARTY? [Show Biz]
